lead_paragraph: The top seed, Anna Chakvetadze of Russia, won her third WTA Tour title of the year as she breezed past Akiko Morigami of Japan, 6-1, 6-3, in the Cincinnati Open final yesterday.The 20-year-old Chakvetadze claimed the first set in 26 minutes, then overcame an 0-2 start to win the second.
